description: This file contains CSS styles including variables for light and dark themes, styles for various elements, and animations for a web application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application styling including background color and text alignment.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo including size and animation.

classes.description: Styling for the application header including layout and background.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links in the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button.
